name: Seagulls (little toe productions)
description: Seagulls - An Unconventional Platformer You, a sea faring captain, have wrecked your raft on an abandoned rock home to a flock of seagulls that are less than keen about your arrival. You must do your best not to drown or be carried off by the seagulls. The game keeps the more traditional feeling of a platformer through it's controls, but introduces some elements of an arcade game.
